discount_rules.name: Discount Rules for WooCommerce - PRO
discount_rules.author: Flycart
discount_rules.description: Create a variety of discount offers in WooCommerce to drive conversions. Easily set up discounts based on product categories, user-roles, and more for a tailored shopping experience.

wployalty.name: WPLoyalty - Points & Rewards for WooCommerce
wployalty.author: WPLoyalty
wployalty.description: Lets you create custom WooCommerce loyalty programs with points, rewards, and exclusive offers. Engage customers, boost retention, and drive repeat purchases.

upsellwp.name: UpsellWP - WooCommerce Upsell, Cross-sell and Order Bumps
upsellwp.author: UpsellWP
upsellwp.description: Increase the average order value with smart offers at checkout. Add one-click upsells and order bumps to your WooCommerce checkout page and motivate customers to buy more.

side_cart.name: Side Cart by UpsellWP
side_cart.author: UpsellWP
side_cart.description: Allow customers to easily manage their purchases and discover upsell opportunities with a visible and accessible sliding widget on your WooCommerce store.

wpbundle.name: WPBundle PRO
wpbundle.author: WPBundle
wpbundle.description: Boost your store revenue by presenting product bundles to your customers.

relay.name: Relay - Affiliate marketing
relay.author: WPRelay
relay.description: Automate and manage your WooCommerce affiliate program effortlessly. Create powerful, customizable affiliate campaigns, streamline sign-ups, track commissions, and ensure smooth payoutsâ€”all from one dashboard.

retainful.name: Retainful - Abandoned Cart Recovery
retainful.author: Retainful
retainful.description: Do life-cycle WooCommerce email marketing with Retainful - grow email list, nurture and retain customers through automation & email campaigns.
